functions.author: Gyver5681
functions.title: BOE Vol 4
pages:
§lBlast Protection I:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use two pieces of gunpowder (R) and a rabbit hide (r) as the reagents. Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left corner (L).
§lL  
 B 
RrR§r

§lBlast Protection II:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use two pieces of gunpowder (R) and a piece of leather (r) as the reagents. Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left and right corners (L).
§lL L
 B 
RrR§r

§lFire Protection I:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use two pieces of charcoal (R) and a rabbit hide (r) as the reagents. Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left corner (L).
§lL  
 B 
RrR§r

§lFire Protection II:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use two pieces of charcoal (R) and a piece of leather (r) as the reagents. Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left and right corners (L).
§lL L
 B

§lProjectile Protection I:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use two arrows (R) and a rabbit hide (r) as the reagents. Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left corner (L).
